TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CookieParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将客户端 HTTP Cookie 的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of a client-side HTTP cookie to a parameter object.

summary.span: 该参数可以在参数化的查询或命令中使用，以选择、筛选或更新数据。

span.span: The parameter can be used in a parameterized query or command to select, filter, or update data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用类以将绑定的客户端 HTTP cookie 作为 HTTP 请求的一部分传递给由 ASP.NET 数据源控件使用的参数的值。You can use the class to bind the value of a client-side HTTP cookie passed as part of an HTTP request to a parameter used by ASP.NET data source controls. 类提供属性，它标识的名称要绑定到除对象继承自类。The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the object to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the class. 类尝试绑定到命名 cookie 每次调用方法。The class attempts to bind to the named cookie every time the method is called. > [!IMPORTANT] > 将数据绑定到参数的控件可能会引发异常，如果指定对象，但没有相应的 cookie 传递使用 HTTP 请求。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a object is specified, but no corresponding cookie is passed with the HTTP request. 同样，它们可能会显示任何数据，如果与传递 cookie `null`。Similarly, they might display no data if the cookie is passed with `null`. 设置属性以避免这些情况下，在适当的位置。Set the property to avoid these situations where appropriate. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件和对象绑定到 HTTP cookie 来显示从 Northwind Traders 数据库中的数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use a control and object bound to an HTTP cookie to display data from the Northwind Traders database in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/CS/cp1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/VB/cp1vb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string CookieName { get; set; }
.property instance string CookieName
Public Property CookieName As String
public: property System::String ^ CookieName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置参数绑定到的 HTTP Cookie 的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the HTTP cookie that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串标识参数绑定到的客户端 HTTP Cookie。

span.span: A string that identifies the client-side HTTP cookie that the parameter binds to.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识的 HTTP cookie，表示对象，并可通过当前对象。The property identifies an HTTP cookie, which is represented by an object and is available through the current object. 如果 HTTP cookie 将不可用在当前对象，方法将参数绑定到的值属性，如果将其设置。If the HTTP cookie is not available in the current object, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果未设置属性，方法无法将参数绑定到一个值。If the property is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以声明方式使用控件和对象绑定到 HTTP cookie 来显示从 Northwind Traders 数据库中的数据控件。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively use a control and a object bound to an HTTP cookie to display data from the Northwind Traders database in a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/CS/cp1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_1/VB/cp1vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式创建对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到控件的集合。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically create a object, set its properties, and add it to a control's collection. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/CS/cookieparam2cs.aspx.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter_2/VB/cookieparam2vb.aspx.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context`参数由方法来检索 cookie 集合和的 cookie 值，对象绑定到。The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the cookies collection and the value of the cookie that the object binds to. `control`参数将被忽略。The `control` parameter is ignored.
